Title: Requires employers and third-party websites, job boards, and recruitment platforms to remove inactive job postings within a certain timeframe
Summary: Requires employers and third-party websites, job boards, and recruitment platforms to remove inactive job postings within a certain timeframe; authorizes the commissioner of labor to promulgate rules and regulations regarding such posting requirements and violations thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring employers and third-party websites, job boards and recruitment platforms to remove inactive job postings within a certain timeframe
